title: Smart Data Models - ITinfrastructure / PersistentStorage
description: Persistent storage requested by a ServiceComponent.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be PersistentStorage

mountPath.description: Property. Mount path in the ServiceComponent of the requested persistent storage.

storageType.description: Property. Type of the requested storage, if local is mounted in the selectedIE of the ServiceComponent, otherwise is mounted in an external infrastructure such a cloud storage system. Enum:'External', 'Local'

hostPath.description: Property. (Only if the storageType is 'local') Host path in the Infrastructure Element where the persistent storage is located.

accessMode.description: Property. Mode of the requested persistent storage. Enum:'ReadWriteOnce', 'ReadOnlyMany', 'ReadWriteMany'

size.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes (MB)'. Size of the requested persistent storage.
